items.sentence: Tom doesn\'t do anything he doesn\'t have to do.
We don\'t need any more volunteers at this time.
We have some new products we\'d like you to see.
Tom had a lot of work to do yesterday afternoon.
Tom had a wonderful time when we were in Boston.
Tom had plenty of opportunity to plant the bomb.
Tom had to stay in the hospital for three weeks.
I couldn\'t help but overhear your conversation.
I didn\'t even know that my car had been stolen.
I don\'t have many friends who can speak French.
